lastfm.summary: "School's Out" is a 1972 title track single released on Alice Cooper's fifth album,School's Out. Cooper has said he was inspired to write the song when answering the question, "What's the greatest three minutes of your life?". Cooper said: "There's two times during the year. One is Christmas morning, when you're just getting ready to open the presents. The greed factor is right there. The next one is the last three minutes of the last day of school when you're sitting there and it's like a slow fuse burning. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: School's Out
